name: Snipetheweb
body:
# SnipeTheWeb

## Description
Take a sniper rifle and hunt down those pesky DOM elements

Press the ` to start shooting away, and press escape to reset everything back when you are done. This works better for websites without too much fancy layouts

## Links
### Greasemonkey/Chrome script
[http://userscripts.org/scripts/discuss/131924 to install the script.](http://userscripts.org/scripts/discuss/131924 to install the script.)
You may install this script to use this on any site
### Source
[https://github.com/razorstorm/SnipeTheWeb](https://github.com/razorstorm/SnipeTheWeb)

### Authors and Contributors
@razorstorm
tagline: Take a sniper rifle and hunt down those pesky DOM elements
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
